name: Create Constellations!
description:
This was created for the Scribble Jam 2021.

The gameplay consists in drawing (with mouse or tablet) and then proyect those scribbles into the sky.

Controls:

Left Click to Draw in the First Fase and to Shoot in the Second one.

WASD or Arrows to walk

Mouse Wheel to select the coonstellation in the Second Fase

Note: You must scribble 9 constellations to proceed. If you don't want continue drawing just click the button with the plus in it multple times

Credits:

Made by Franco Veliz

Sound Effects from: InspectorJ and monte32

Skybox made using the "Procedural Generation of 2D Space Scenes in WebGL" by Rye Terrell
